textbox: A one-time use item which when used, will duplicate any pedestal items or consumables in the current room
textbox 2: If used in a shop, the duplicated items can be taken for free
textbox 3: If used on a trinket, another random trinket will spawn instead of a duplicate
textbox 4: If used in the Boss Rush, all the duplicates can be taken for free as well as one of the original items
textbox 7: Recharge Time: Instant (One time use)
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop

textbox: When used, copies the effect of the pill you are currently holding without consuming it
textbox 2: The charge time of this item depends on the quality of the pill you're holding
textbox 3: Does not copy effects of Cards or Runes
textbox 7: Recharge Time: Varies
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: When used, has a 50% chance to drop one random type of coin (penny, nickel or dime)
textbox 2: Keeper starts with this item after beating Isaac with Keeper
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 1 room
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by donating 33 coins to the Greed Donation Machine

textbox: With this item, at the start of every room you will deal double your tear damage to the entire room in a poison effect
textbox 2: Enemies killed now also leave a pool of creep on the ground where they died. This deals 1 damage per tick
textbox 3: High tear damage will cause this item to become very powerful for rooms with a lot of enemies, since they can die instantly and render the room harmless
textbox 4: Enemies which spawn after the first few seconds of each room are not affected by this item, e.g. Flies spawned from a Mulligan dying
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: When used, the Mega Bean will freeze all enemies in the current room for a couple of seconds, deal 5 damage and poison any enemies in close proximity and send a wave of spikes across the room in the direction you are facing
textbox 2: The enemies in close range will take 5 damage then have a poison over time effect which deals your tear damage 4 or 6 times
textbox 3: The spike wave will deal 10 damage to any enemies in contact with it
textbox 4: Can be used to open secret rooms
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 3 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Glass Cannon allows you to fire one huge spectral tear that deals a lot of damage.
textbox 2: When taking damage, the cannon will break and remain broken until recharged (Recharge time: 4 rooms)
textbox 3: When you take damage and the cannon breaks, you take an additional 2 full hearts of damage and gain the Anemic effect for the room.
textbox 4: The damage done by Glass Cannon is calculated as follows: dmg = (dmg * 10) + 10 (i.e. at base damage of 3.5, that's 45 damage)
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 5 seconds
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +5 bombs
textbox 2: Isaac's bombs will now explode in a large cross-shaped pattern (roughly 5 bombs explosions wide)
textbox 3: This also affects troll bombs
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Bomb Beggar

textbox: +1 HP Up
textbox 2: Spawns a random trinket on the floor
textbox 7: Item Pool: Boss Room, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: +0.38 Range Up
textbox 2: +1 Luck Up
textbox 3: +1 Soul Heart
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 mom items needed towards the Mom transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Boss Room, Gold/Stone Chest, Mom's Chest

textbox: The Car Battery causes your spacebar item to activate twice on each use
textbox 2: For example, with Yum Heart you would heal 2 full red hearts instead of 1
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: Upon use, gives you a duplicate of each familiar you have for the current room
textbox 2: It will not 'double' your familiars as the tagline suggests - if you have 2 of one kind, it will only give you an extra one
textbox 3: If the familiar only appears when taking damage (i.e. Dead Bird) then Box of Friends will cause it to spawn but won't create duplicates
textbox 4: This can be used multiple times in the same room to generate more familiars, meaning you can get a level 4 meatboy or bandage girl by using this item 3 times in the same room
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 3 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Lilith

textbox: Isaac wears a dunce hat and fires 2 tears at once diagonally, similar to the R U A WIZARD pill tear pattern
textbox 2: Gives Isaac spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks)
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +1.5 Damage Up
textbox 2: Replaces Isaac's tears with nails, which have increased knockback
textbox 3: The increased knockback will also affect Brimstone, which usually has no knockback at all
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Gives you a familiar demon incubus that follows you and shoots tears that scale with your own tears in terms of damage, stats and also effects
textbox 2: It will mimic any tear effects you currently have and also copy your current stats, meaning it will fire with the same damage, fire rate and range
textbox 3: Lilith starts with this item
textbox 4: Incubus' damage is reduced by 25% when playing as characters other than Lilith
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Lilith

textbox: A familiar blue head that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear damage and effects
textbox 2: This familiar is very similar to Incubus, however it only copies damage and is not affected by tears or range upgrades
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with ??? (Blue baby)

textbox: A familiar chest that follows Isaac and has a 25% chance to drop a pickup after clearing a room
textbox 2: Possible drops include hearts, coins, bombs, key, pills, card, runes, batteries, trinket
textbox 3: There's a 10% chance to spawn a trinket
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Beggar
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Isaac

textbox: An orbital angel which does 7 contact damage per tick and blocks shots
textbox 2: The angel will attract bullets towards it and block them
textbox 3: Sworn Protector will drop an eternal heart if it blocks 10 shots in one room. Can only happen once per room
textbox 4: Visually this is almost identical to the Guardian Angel item, but without a face
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room
textbox 8: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with The Lost

textbox: A white orbiting fly which deals 3 contact damage per tick to enemies
textbox 2: This familiar orbits Isaac at a middle length distance somewhere between Distant Admiration and Forever Alone
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Key Beggar

textbox: A familiar fly that moves in a straight line and attaches itself to the first obstacle or wall it comes into contact with in each room.
textbox 2: If any enemies walk into its path, it will deal 7 contact damage every 7 frames
textbox 3: Nearby enemies will be forced to target and attack it
textbox 4: If the obstacle it is attached to is destroyed then it will continue rolling in the direction it was previously travelling until it meets another wall or obstacle
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Key Beggar

textbox: +5 bombs
textbox 2: Causes your bombs to explode into 2-4 tiny bombs
textbox 3: The smaller bombs deal half damage and have a smaller explosion area. They also retain most of your bomb synergizing items
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Bomb Beggar

textbox: This item causes your bombs to stick to enemies and when exploding will leave white creep on the ground which slows enemies
textbox 2: When one of your bombs kills an enemy, a bunch of blue spiders are spawned to fight by your side, which deal x2 your current damage
textbox 3: +5 Bombs
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Bomb Beggar, Bomb Beggar

textbox: Shooting in one direction increases your fire rate until a cap is reached
textbox 2: The maximum effect is to halve your delay, which takes roughly 10 seconds to achieve
textbox 3: The accuracy of your tears is also reduced as your fire rate increases
textbox 4: As soon as you change firing direction, your fire rate is reset to its normal amount
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +3 Range Up
textbox 2: Tears will now travel through walls and appear out of the opposite wall, similar to a portal-type mechanic
textbox 3: Your tears can now also travel over rocks and objects in the environment
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +0.7 Tears Up
textbox 2: +1.5 Range Up
textbox 3: Spawns 3 random types of hearts on the floor
textbox 7: Item Pool: Boss Room, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: Causes Isaac to spawn 6 troll bombs on the floor every time he gets hit, similar to the Anarchist Cookbook mechanic
textbox 2: Doesn't trigger on damage taken from blood donation machines and devil beggars (but still triggers on other forms of intentional self damage such as IV Bag)
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Red Chest, Curse Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: A familiar baby that has a random chance to drop a battery pickup or freeze all enemies in the room for a short while
textbox 2: Charged Baby also has a chance to add one charge to your spacebar item
textbox 3: These effects can only occur while in a hostile room with enemies
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: Gives Isaac a +25% damage up for every tear that successfully hits an enemy
textbox 2: The bonus from Dead Eye maxes out at double your damage (+100%)
textbox 3: If a tear misses an enemy, there is a chance for the multiplier to be reset back to 1. It's a 20% chance on first miss, 33% for a second miss and 50% for anything beyond that
textbox 4: Piercing shots work with this item and multiple hits with a single tear will each give a damage bonus
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Isaac has a random chance to fire a Holy tear, which when it hits an enemy, will spawn a light beam on the same enemy, dealing damage
textbox 2: The beams from this item deal damage equal to 400% of your tear damage (4x damage multiplier for the beams only)
textbox 3: The chance to fire a Holy tear is affected by your luck stat, maxing out at a 50% chance
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 angel items needed towards the Seraphim transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Angel Room

textbox: A familiar host that sits on Isaac's head and has a 20% chance to block enemy shots
textbox 2: When a shot is blocked, Host Hat will fire 3 bullets back at the enemy
textbox 3: Causes you to become immune to explosions, but doesn't protect against stomps or shockwaves
textbox 4: Blocks damage from projectiles falling from above
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Causes your shops to instantly restock their items when you buy them
textbox 2: New items generated by Restock are from the shop item pool
textbox 3: The cost increases exponentially every time you purchase an item. For Items it increases by 2 coins * the number of purchases. For everything it increases by 1 coin * the number of purchases
textbox 4: The max price of an item is always 99c with this item
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Beggar

textbox: Most spider enemies no longer target or deal contact damage to Isaac
textbox 2: This is very similar to a Skatole for spiders instead of flies
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 spider items needed towards the Spider Baby transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Continuously firing or charging tears for 3 seconds causes Isaac to fart and drop a Butt Bomb
textbox 2: Only 1 Butt Bomb can be dropped per charge, so you'll need to stop firing then start again to drop another one
textbox 3: Butt Bombs explode for 50 damage like normal bombs, but also deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 poop items needed towards the Oh Crap transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Transforms Isaac's tears into a wide arc shape which doubles their size and hitbox
textbox 2: Gives Isaac spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks)
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: +5 coins
textbox 2: This item turns all doors that require a key into doors which need a coin to enter instead
textbox 3: This affects shops, item rooms, libraries, double locked doors, key blocks, chests and other key doors
textbox 4: Changes the appearance of doors and objects that this item works on to show a coin slot instead of a keyhole
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: +0.7 Tears Up
textbox 2: Gives you a random item at the start of your next run (You need to start a fresh run to receive the item)
textbox 3: Important progression items such as Key Pieces or the Mom's Shovel pieces cannot be given by Eden's Blessing
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Eden

textbox: When used, can be thrown at enemies to capture them (similar to a Pok√© Ball)
textbox 2: After capturing an enemy, the next use of the Friendly Ball will re-spawn the same enemy as a friendly companion which will attack other enemies
textbox 3: The companion will persist between rooms and floors until it dies by taking enough damage
textbox 4: Walking over the thrown ball after capturing an enemy will immediately recharge it
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 2 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: When used, will detonate any tears currently on the screen and cause each one to split into 6 more tears which will fire in a circle, similar to Tammy's Head
textbox 2: Luck-based items such as Holy Light are applied to each tear individually
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 15 seconds
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Gives Isaac a familiar Gurdy that will charge around the room dealing contact damage to enemies
textbox 2: The Gurdy is charged by holding down the fire button and letting go. The longer the button is held the faster Gurdy will fling itself across the screen
textbox 3: Deals a fixed amount of damage depending on charge level, at lowest being ~5 and at max being ~20
textbox 4: Lil Gurdy bounces off of enemies and obstacles
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: A beggar head which floats around the room and picks up any nearby coins. Every 6 coins Bumbo will evolve to a new form except for level 4 which takes 12 coins
textbox 2: Level 2: Bumbo gains a body and crawls around the room, sometimes dropping random pickups
textbox 3: Level 3: It now fires tears in the same direction Isaac does
textbox 4: Level 4: Bumbo no longer fires tears but instead will chase enemies slowly and deal contact damage. It will also sometimes randomly drop bombs
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Beggar

textbox: When used, the D12 re-rolls any rocks into another random type of object (e.g. poop, pots, TNT, red poop, stone blocks, spikes, fireplaces etc.)
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 3 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Shop
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Cain

textbox: Gives Isaac a familiar golden Censer which creates a huge aura of light that slows down any enemies inside it
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Maggy

textbox: A familiar beggar similar to Bum Friend that follows Isaac and collects keys, giving random chests in return
textbox 2: Doesn't pick up golden keys
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 bum items needed towards the Super Bum transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Key Beggar
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Lazarus

textbox: A bag that follows Isaac and drops a random Rune or Soul Stone every 7 or 8 rooms
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Lilith

textbox: A familiar angel which follows Isaac and fires Sacred Heart tears which deal 10 damage at -25% shot speed and a reduced fire rate
textbox 2: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

textbox: This item causes enemy projectiles to be able to hit other enemies. When an enemy takes damage from an enemy projectile, it will attempt to target the enemy that fired it
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Judas

textbox: Zodiac will give you a random zodiac item effect that changes after every floor
textbox 2: Possible item effects include: Taurus, Aries, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Gemini or Pisces
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 astrology items needed in the same run to unlock Planetariums
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with The Lost

textbox: Tears now have a random chance to apply a poison effect, dealing damage equal to your tears each tick, for 2 ticks
textbox 2: Isaac now deals poison damage on contact with enemies similar to The Virus item (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick)
textbox 3: Enemies that were poisoned by contact damage have a 20% chance to drop a black sin heart when killed. Only contact poison has this effect - poison from tears doesn't work
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lilith

textbox: Isaac will now fire tears automatically directed at a red target on the ground which is controlled by the player
textbox 2: This allows for a full 360 degree tear firing radius
textbox 3: Can be overridden by other tear modifiers such as Mom's Knife or Brimstone
textbox 4: Every time you leave the room this effect turns off until you press a shoot button again
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
textbox 8: +3.0 Range Up

textbox: Tears are replaced with the ability to charge and fire a laser ring that travels across the room
textbox 2: The size of the ring will depend on how long you charge it
textbox 3: The laser ring does damage scaling based on charge, from 25% at minimum to 100% at max
textbox 4: Rings have infinite range and travel until they hit a wall
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Allows you to create one brown tunnel and one blue tunnel in the floor, that can be used to teleport between wherever you placed each one
textbox 2: This item will let you port out of the devil room but not back into it
textbox 3: Very useful in the boss rush and challenge rooms
textbox 7: Recharge Time: Instant
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop

textbox: Isaac's tears now travel directly forwards following a beam of light, but will also move sideways based on your player movement
textbox 2: +0.5 Tears Up
textbox 3: +1.5 Range Up
textbox 4: +0.16 Shot Speed Up
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
textbox 8: If you switch the direction in which you are firing tears, the beam of light and all your tears will also be transported to the new direction

textbox: Tears now have a random chance to apply a shrinking effect, causing enemies to shrink in size for 5 seconds and also run away from Isaac
textbox 2: Shrunk enemies can be crushed and killed by walking over them
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 mushroom items needed towards the Fun Guy transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: After firing tears for 3 seconds, a red cross appears on Isaac's head that, upon releasing the fire button, creates a black ring which deals a lot of damage to any enemies inside it
textbox 2: The ring deals damage equal to your tear damage rapidly to any enemies in contact with it, for a total of 30 ticks of damage
textbox 3: You have to keep the fire button held down for the full 3 seconds to cause this effect
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 evil items needed towards the Leviathan transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Azazel

textbox: In addition to tears, Isaac now holds a spear infront of him which deals damage equal to 2 times your tear damage
textbox 2: The spear occasionally inflicts fear on enemies it damages.
textbox 3: The spear cannot be thrown like Mom's Knife but deals damage while it is in contact with an enemy
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

textbox: Tears now have a random chance to become sticky bombs, which will attach to enemies and explode after a few seconds
textbox 2: The bomb explosion deals your tear damage + 60
textbox 3: Explosivo shots deal regular tear damage upon sticking to an enemy
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Causes all item pedestals to be chosen from a random item pool instead of the pre-defined ones which normally exist
textbox 2: When picked up, drops between 1-6 random pickups on the floor
textbox 3: Makes it possible to see items that have been rerolled away, preventing emptying the item pool and Breakfasting
textbox 4: Fixed item drops won't be replaced - e.g. Cube of Meat after defeating a Horseman
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Secret Room

textbox: A familiar grey spider that wanders around and allows you to see your tear damage and the health bars of all enemies
textbox 2: The spider will inflict a random status effect on any enemies it comes into contact with (e.g. slow, shrink, fear)
textbox 3: Spider Mod will also randomly drop battery consumables or blue spiders when a room is completed
textbox 4: For the sake of simplicity for players, all damage values displayed are multiplied by 10 and rounded to the nearest number
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: A familiar that follows Isaac and blocks tears
textbox 2: If a tear hits Farting Baby, there is a 10% chance for it to fart, with 3 possible effects: Charm, Poison or Knock back
textbox 3: Charm deals 5 damage. Poison deals 5 damage initially and then 3.5
textbox 4: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Isaac

textbox: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac.
textbox 2: Double tapping the fire button launches it forward, causing it to reroll the first monster, trinket, or pickup it hits
textbox 3: GB Bug respawns after a room has been cleared
textbox 4: Cannot reroll bosses - instead just deals 8 contact damage
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Secret Room, Greed Mode Shop
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eden

textbox: When used, the D8 rerolls all of your stats
textbox 2: Will only effect your damage, tears, range and speed stats
textbox 3: Each stat is given a multiplier that applies after all other adjustments
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 4 Rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Shop
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #28 (Pride Day)

textbox: Purity will boost one of Isaac's stats depending on the colour of the aura around him
textbox 2: When you take damage, the aura will be removed and replaced with another random one when you enter the next room
textbox 3: Colour code is as follows:
textbox 4: Red = +4.0 Damage
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Angel Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Greed Mode Angel Room
textbox 8: Yellow = +0.5 Speed Up
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Maggy

textbox: Adds a chance for a black ring to spawn around killed enemies, dealing damage to others that touch it
textbox 2: The ring damage scales with your tear damage
textbox 3: The chance for a ring to spawn scales with your luck stat
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Eve

textbox: +2 Black Hearts
textbox 2: When Isaac has no red hearts, this item gives Isaac the ability to fly. Every 40 seconds spent in the same room since last activating, when the timer displays 00, 20 or 40 seconds, a shield triggers, nullifying all types of damage for 10 seconds
textbox 3: As soon as Isaac has half a red heart or more, this item deactivates
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Demon Beggar
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Lazarus

textbox: While firing tears this item gives you a chance to fire an eye across the screen with a very slow shot speed, which will fire tears of its own in the same direction as Isaac
textbox 2: The evil eye shots will be destroyed if they come into contact with enemies or obstacles
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Cain

textbox: Each time Isaac kills an enemy, you get a temporary +0.5 damage up which lasts for the current room
textbox 2: Each subsequent kill will stack further damage up to a maximum of +5 Damage Up after 10 kills
textbox 3: This item is the same principle as the Bloody Lust item from the original flash game
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Devil Room, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Samson

textbox: After taking enough damage you will gain a permanent demon familiar
textbox 2: Possible familiars include: Dark Bum, Demon Baby, Leech, Lil' Brimstone, Succubus, Incubus, Lil Abaddon, Twisted Pair
textbox 3: The effect is shown visually in 3 stages with the character's belly getting larger each time until it finally gives birth to a familiar.
textbox 4: The first and second familiars spawn after 15 hits, then 30 hits for the third and fourth
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
textbox 8: Lilith starts with this item
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating ??? with Lilith

textbox: After picking up 15 hearts, Isaac gains a permanent angelic familiar and a soul heart drops
textbox 2: Possible familiars include: Holy Water, Guardian Angel, Sworn Protector, The Relic and Seraphim
textbox 3: It is possible to get multiple followers by continuing to pick up hearts, at intervals of 15 hearts each
textbox 4: After all 5 familiars have spawned, it will just drop a soul heart every 15 hearts collected
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Lilith

textbox: Two items now spawn in each of your item rooms, however only one can be taken and the other will disappear
textbox 2: Doesn't work for half-sized item rooms
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop

textbox: +2 Soul Hearts
textbox 2: A crown that replaces normal tears with blue diamond tears while you don't have any empty red heart containers or bone hearts
textbox 3: While the effect is active, tears do double damage and have -0.30 Shot Speed
textbox 4: The crown will glow blue while active, if inactive it will appear grey
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

textbox: Increases your money cap to 999
textbox 2: When a room clear would otherwise yield no rewards, it now spawns 1-3 pennies
textbox 3: Previously this item would add an extra card/pill slot, however this was removed with the Repentance rebalance
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room, Greed Mode Shop
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Chest floor with Keeper

textbox: A flying familiar that bounces around the room with a damaging aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it and boosting Isaac's tear damage
textbox 2: While standing in the black aura, Isaac has a temporary 1.5x damage multiplier (this will stack if you have more than one Succubus)
textbox 3: The aura deals 2.5 damage per tick or about 7.5 - 10 damage per second
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Demon Beggar
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb with Lilith

textbox: Gives you a different tear effect with every tear that you fire
textbox 2: Tear effects include: Anti-Gravity, Ball of Bandages (Lvl 4), Bumbo (Lvl 3), Continuum, Cupid's Arrow, Compound Fracture, Euthanasia, Explosivo, Eye of Greed, Fire Mind, Flat Stone, Flat Worm, God's Flesh, Godhead, Head of the Keeper, Holy Light, Hook Worm, Ipecac, Iron Bar, Jacob's Ladder, Knockout Drops, Lachryphagy, Little Horn, Lodestone, Mom's Contacts, Mom's Eyeshadow, Mom's Perfume, Mucormycosis, My Reflection, Mysterious Liquid, Ocular Rift, Ouija Board, Ouroboros Worm, The Parasite, Parasitoid, Polyphemus, Pop!, Proptosis, Pulse Worm, Ring Worm, Rotten Tomato, Rubber Cement, Serpent's Kiss, Sinus Infection, Spider Bite, Strange Attractor, Sulfuric Acid, Technology Zero, Tiny Planet, Trisagion and Wiggle Worm
textbox 3: With Dr. Fetus, this item will also cycle through random Bomb Modifiers (e.g. Butt Bombs, Hot Bombs)
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: When used will teleport you to another random room that has not been explored yet
textbox 2: After all the normal rooms have been explored, the hierarchy of rooms chosen is: Super Secret Room, Shop, Item Room, Sacrifice Room, Dice Room, Library, Curse Room, Miniboss, Challenge Room, Bedroom, Arcade, Vault, Secret Room, Devil/Angel Room, I AM ERROR
textbox 3: This ordering means a Devil and I Am Error room can both be forced if all others have been visited
textbox 4: If used in a normal room with enemies it will teleport you out and back into the exact same room
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 4 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: Walking in a circle will spawn a pentagram symbol on the floor, which deals 10 damage per tick to any enemies inside it
textbox 2: The trail of black powder left on the floor will quickly disappear, meaning you are limited on the size of the pentagram symbol you can create
textbox 3: Will deal damage to flying enemies inside the pentagram
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Demon Beggar

textbox: When used, applies the charm effect to any enemies in close range and deals 5 damage
textbox 2: Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac
textbox 3: REPENTANCE - Kidney Bean now has a bigger effect radius, no longer deals damage to the enemies it's charming, and charge time has been reduced to 1 (from 2).
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 1 Rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: When used, this item will rewind time and put you back in the previous room, in the same state you were in at that moment
textbox 2: This means any damage taken or consumables used in the current room will be reset back to the previous state
textbox 3: Can be used to check the contents of an Item Room without affecting Planetarium spawn chances
textbox 4: Glowing Hour Glass has no cooldown, but can only be used 3 times per floor
textbox 7: Recharge Time: None (Max 3 use per floor)
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room, Shop, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: Gives Isaac a large white halo around him, that deals a bit of damage to any enemies in contact with the ring
textbox 2: Every time an enemy bullet enters the ring, there is a chance it will reflect a homing tear back at the enemy
textbox 7: Item Pool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

textbox: Coins have a 10% chance to be replaced with Sack. Bombs, keys, cards, runes and batteries have a 20% chance
textbox 2: Spawns a sack when picked up
textbox 3: Can lead to game-breaking combinations with the D20 due to the amount of consumables and batteries spawned by the item sacks
textbox 4: REPENTANCE - Added to the Secret Room pool
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Secret Room

textbox: Gives Isaac a cone of light infront of him that slows any enemies inside it and their tears
textbox 2: The light faces the direction that you are facing, not the direction you are firing
textbox 3: Removes Curse of Darkness for the current floor, if picked up on a floor where the curse is active
textbox 7: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: A purple familiar fly that follows your exact movement on a 1 second delay and deals 2 contact damage to enemies
textbox 2: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar

textbox: When used, places an explosive TNT barrel next to you
textbox 2: The TNT barrel can be pushed and used to explode rocks or damage enemies
textbox 3: If used a second time in the same room while the last TNT barrel is still there, it will remotely explode the first TNT and not spawn another
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 1 room
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: +4 Soul Hearts
textbox 2: Fully restores your red health
textbox 3: REPENTANCE - Added to the Gold Chest Pool
textbox 7: Item Pool: Boss Room, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a 5% chance to drop pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy
textbox 2: Has a chance to drop when exploding a dead shopkeeper
textbox 7: Item Pool: Dead shopkeeper

textbox: A familiar blue fly that will follow Isaac's movement pattern but delayed by 1 second
textbox 2: Papa Fly will fire tears at nearby enemies that deal damage equal to Isaac's tear damage
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Key Beggar

textbox: A familiar baby that will follow your movement pattern on a 2 second delay
textbox 2: Tears that pass through the baby will double up and gain x1.33 speed boost
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 familiar items needed towards the Conjoined transformation.
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room

textbox: +5 bombs
textbox 2: Isaac's normal bombs become pink and causes them to drop random pickups when they explode (e.g. keys, coins, bombs, trinkets)
textbox 3: Bombs have a chance to charm enemies
textbox 4: The chance for pickups to spawn decreases by 1% each time Glitter Bombs provides something (resets at the next floor). This is to prevent a syngery like Dr. Fetus or a Golden Bomb giving you infinite resources
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Bomb Beggar

textbox: Isaac's shadow will follow closely behind him and when it comes into contact with enemies, will spawn friendly dark charger mobs
textbox 2: The chargers deal contact damage to enemies, and will be killed if it is hurt too much
textbox 3: Chargers disappear upon entering a new room
textbox 7: Item Pool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Judas

textbox: Every time you kill an enemy a fly will be added to the Jar, allowing you to stack up to 20
textbox 2: Using the Jar of Flies will release all the flies that are currently in the jar as friendly flies that will damage enemies
textbox 3: Counts as 1 of 3 fly items needed towards the Beelzebub transformation
textbox 7: Recharge Time: Instant
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room, Greed Mode Shop

textbox: A Loki familiar that follows Isaac and shoots tears 4 tears in a cross pattern, dealing a flat 3.5 damage each
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: Gives Isaac a familiar glass of milk that follows him and spills on the floor upon taking damage
textbox 2: After being spilt, the milk gives you a -2 Tear Delay (Tears up) for the rest of the room
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

textbox: When used, the D7 will restart the current room and bring back all enemies once again, enabling you to farm rewards that spawn at the end after beating the room
textbox 2: Can be used to generate infinite consumable combinations, gaining as many coins/keys/bombs as you need
textbox 3: This item has no effect in Greed Mode, Challenge Rooms and rooms that had no enemies in originally
textbox 4: If used in a Boss Room or Angel/Devil Room, you get teleported to another random room, which is reset instead of the boss/angel/devil room you were in
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 3 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Item Room

textbox: +1 Soul heart
textbox 2: +0.75 Tears Up
textbox 3: Isaac size down
textbox 4: Makes Isaac very small like a baby, reducing his hitbox size
textbox 7: Item Pool: Boss Room, Gold/Stone Chest

textbox: When used, Mom's Box will drop a random trinket on the ground
textbox 2: +1 Luck while held
textbox 3: While held, doubles the effect of trinkets which make sense to be doubled (e.g. +4 damage from Curved Horn instead of 2, -4 Tear Delay from Cancer instead of 2)
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 4 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Shop, Greed Mode Shop, Mom's Chest

textbox: Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. In the burst of tears is a kidney stone which deals a lot of damage
textbox 2: REPENTANCE - Kidney Stone is no longer a speed downgrade
textbox 7: Item Pool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #29 (Onan's Streak)

textbox: Upon use, fires a huge Mega Satan laser for 15 seconds, dealing your tear damage * 5 per tick to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force
textbox 2: The laser persists for the entire 15 seconds even between rooms and floors
textbox 3: This item appears in the Devil Room but is weighted to be about 5 times rarer than all other devil room items
textbox 7: Recharge Time: 12 rooms
textbox 8: Item Pool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
r-unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mega Satan with every character
